title: Home
text:
I’m a computer science student focused on machine learning systems, representation learning, and applied research.
My interests sit at the intersection of: - ML & statistical modeling - systems (performance, scalability, infrastructure) - real-world deployment constraints
I’m currently: - working on research projects in ML and data-intensive systems
- building long-horizon technical artifacts (code, papers, tools)
- preparing for graduate-level research or frontier industry labs
You can find my work below.




Robust representation learning under distribution shift

ML systems efficiency (training + inference)

Research-quality software engineering

If you’d like to chat, feel free to reach out via email or GitHub.
